WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing.No new similar issues have been posted. The OP can't reproduce this anymore. Neither kan Kavan or me.  Assumed to be an issue with a 'bad' item cache.
WorkItem.Description:
Follow link or see attached file for screenshot of error:  http://img.skitch.com/20100429-fjmesf3s5tni47tw8jx3wb7bts.png
 
To reproduce Error:
Load the following..
Character: Ketrew
Server: Blackrock
 
Upon loading I get the following error:
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments:
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=3.0.50106.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException
 
   at Rawr.Retribution.CalculationsRetribution.ProcessSpecialEffect(SpecialEffect effect, Rotation rot, SealOf seal, Single baseWeaponSpeed, Single fightLength, Int32 stackTrinketReset)
   at Rawr.Retribution.CalculationsRetribution.GetCharacterStats(Character character, Item additionalItem, Boolean computeAverageStats, Ability[] rotation, Decimal simulationTime)
   at Rawr.Retribution.CalculationsRetribution.GetCharacterRotation(Character character, Item additionalItem, Ability[] rotation, Decimal simulationTime)
   at Rawr.Retribution.CalculationsRetribution.GetCharacterRotation(Character character, Item additionalItem)
   at Rawr.Retribution.CalculationsRetribution.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character, Item additionalItem, Boolean referenceCalculation, Boolean significantChange, Boolean needsDisplayCalculations)
   at Rawr.Calculations.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character, Item additionalItem, Boolean referenceCalculation, Boolean significantChange, Boolean needsDisplayCalculations)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.character_CalculationsInvalidated(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.set_Character(Character value)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.armoryLoad_Closed(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.OnClosed(EventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.Close()
   at System.Windows.Controls.ChildWindow.set_DialogResult(Nullable`1 value)
   at Rawr.UI.ArmoryLoadDialog._armoryService_GetCharacterCompleted(Object sender, EventArgs`1 e)

Comments.Message: I can't reproduce this with loading from armory, please attach character xml where this happens.
I can view other ret paladins without any issues.  This also only happens on my Mac using Safari 4.0.5 and Firefox 3.6.3.  I don't see the same issue on my PC.
I reset the item cache and forced a character refresh and the issue has gone away.
